modName: Spectral Blades - Ghostblade and Drainheart Sword
summary: A replacer for Ghostblade and Drainheart Sword weapon models. Uses an esp file for Ghostblade and weapon stat values for both weapons. Also comes in 3 colors.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b]

*Version 2.1: Missing ESP changes now rectified along with other updated values.[/b]

[color=Aqua][b][i]*Drainheart Sword now has a slim variant model in "Optional Files" download section.
[/i][/b][/color]
[color=Aqua][i][b]*[/b]This mod is compatible with my other mod[b], [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92222]Spectral Armaments[/url].[/b][/i][/color]


[b]*[/b][/size][b][size=4]Version 2[/size][size=3] now up; uses [/size][b][size=3]JSBrayker[/size][/b][size=3]'s [/size][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13149]Spectral Weapon Pack[/url]﻿ [/size][size=3]appearance / nif settings. See latest images for reference. Thanks.

[/size]



[size=3][center]This mod replaces [b]Ghostblade [/b]and [b]Drainheart Sword[/b] models along with their modified stats (as of [b]v2.1[/b]):[/center][/size]


[center][size=3][b]Ghostblade [/b][/size][b]= [/b][size=4][b]12[/b][/size][b] [/b]Damage[b] [size=3]//[/size] [/b][size=4][b]18[/b][/size][b] [/b]Crit Damage[b][size=3] //[/size] [size=4]1.2[/size] [/b]Weapon speed[b] [size=3]//[/size] [/b][size=3]Detection Level[/size] [b]= [/b][b][size=4]Silent[/size] [/b][size=3][b]//[/b] Value [/size]= [b][size=3]850[/size][/b]

[size=3]Now it deals[/size][b] [size=3]15[/size] [/b][size=3]extra points of damage that ignores armor.[/size]



[b][size=3]Drainheart Sword[/size] =[size=4] 19[/size] [/b]Damage [b]//[/b] [size=4][b]13[/b][/size][b] [/b]Crit Damage [b]//[/b] [size=4][b]1.1[/b][/size][b] [/b]Weapon speed [b]// [/b]Value [b]= [/b][b][size=3]500[/size][/b]

[size=3]Now absorbs [/size][b][size=3]20[/size][/b][size=3] points of stamina.[/size][/center]




[b][center][size=5]*New in V2:[/size][/center]
[/b][center][size=3]Each sword now comes in 3 colors: [/size][b][size=3]Cyan, Dark Blue [/size][/b]and [b][size=3]Purple[/size][/b][size=3][b].[/b] DSR patches also included for each color.[/size][/center]




[/b][center][b][size=4]Note for V1:[/size] 

[/b][size=3]The first two screenshots of the weapons are from Nifskope (V1). Ingame, it doesn't exactly show the actual patterns of the blade which is quite noticeable in Ghostblade (see 3rd and 4th image for reference); it's quite garbled up close.



[/size][size=4]Check out the other pair of [b]Spectral[/b] weapons!



[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92222][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/10838763-1530267020.png[/img][/url]﻿﻿[/size][/center]

My other weapon mods:

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92328][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/92328/92328-1531322631-1378635900.png[/img][/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92285][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/92285/92285-1530553726-649391902.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92663][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/92663/92663-1532268686-1165311428.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/92767][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/10838763-1532839364.png[/img][/url]
author: Vilidran
